external_games.name: Silpheed Alternative: Menace from Beyond the Stars
Silpheed Alternative: Menace from Beyond the Stars

name: Silpheed Alternative: Menace from Beyond the Stars
summary: Silpheed Alternative is an Android exclusive entry to the Silpheed series. Like the 2007 Xbox 360 exclusive Project Sylpheed it is a third person dogfighting game rather than a vertical scrolling shooter like the original games.
